text: are weary long is the way and the mountains are wide soon will the twilight blow the moonlit and dreary over the bath of the poor orphan child
why did they send me so far and so lowly up where the moss-spread and grave-rock are piled
men are hard-hearted and kind angels only watch o'er the steps of a poor orphan child
yet distant and soft the night breeze is blowing clouds there are none and clear stars
my god in his mercy protection is showing comfort and hope to the poor orphan child
